name: Carcassonne Board Game
description:
Carcassonne Board Game is a tile-based board game for two to four players.

In the game, players build a map by placing city, road or cloister tiles. Points are scored by placing 'meeples' on the tiles. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.

You can play this game against real people (pass and play or online) or against 'computer' players. The game is automatically saved when you close the app, so it is easy to resume when you open the app the next time.

Features:
- Resume saved game
- Local multiplayer
- Computer players

Sound effects and background music by Samuel Boechat.
